Headline: Angela Dewan
Article_Body: Angela Dewan is a Senior Digital Producer with CNN International in London. She covers breaking world news stories, writes political analysis, and produces and edits digital content from senior correspondents. She has in recent years focused her work on Putin's Russia, the Syrian war, Brexit and developments in Turkey after the failed 2016 coup. Before joining CNN, Angela spent seven years as a correspondent and news editor in Southeast Asia. Based in Jakarta, she covered two elections that shaped Indonesia's democracy after more than three decades of dictatorship, and reported on the geopolitics and security issues around the South China Sea. You can reach her at Angela.Dewan@turner.com and follow her on Twitter @angeladewan.
